Fixes the issue where the mergeCart mutation fails with an "Internal Server Error" in GraphQL response when merging source and destination carts that have the same bundle items.
Fixes the issue where configurable and bundle products display as Out of Stock on the storefront when display out of product configuration is disabled.
Fixes the issue where the imported customer is duplicated with the same email address when import is used with account sharing set to Global.

Fixes an error message "Trying to access array offset on value of type null" that displays during setup:upgrade when the database contains a custom MySQL trigger not related to the indexation mechanism and MView.
Fixes the issue when a new transaction is created in PayPal Payflow Pro each time the Fetch button is clicked on the view transaction screen in the Admin.
Fixes the issue where an admin user with access restrictions to specific websites is able to see companies from all websites in the Companies grid.
Fixes incorrect product sorting by multiple sort fields in GraphQL.
Fixes the issue where the Order dashboard displays incorrect order information until the time period is updated. The dashboard now displays correct order statistics on first load.
Fixes the issue when product GraphQL requests returned disabled categories in the category aggregations.
Fixes the issue where updating a scheduled update removed the previous version of the staged item if no end date is specified.
Fixes the issue where product images are removed after deleting a staging update.
Fixes the issue where URL rewrites cause infinite page looping after "Website Root" is unchecked from Hierarchy.
Fixes the issue where the orders placed from non-default websites with terms and conditions enabled are not processed correctly.
Fixes the issue where shipping an order to multiple addresses triggers an error during region ID processing.
Fixes the issue where products with custom options are incorrectly added to the shopping cart via GraphQL.
Fixes the issue where GraphQL products search with filter for zero prices does not return any results due to an exception.
Fixes the issue where product options are incorrectly assigned to the admin store instead of their respective stores.
Fixes the issue where it is possible to generate customer tokens for inactive customers via API.
Fixes the issue where a Cart Price Rule doesn't apply a discount for a guest customer from the matching Customer Segment cart without a coupon code.
Fixes the "YouTube API Key" configuration by setting the scope to global. The wrong configuration was causing an error when adding a YouTube video at the Store View level.
Fixes the issue where when deleting a team with child users or teams irrespective of their status (inactive), the system provides an uninformative error message not consistent with the UI.
Fixes the issue where partial reindexing throws an error. It now works correctly with big change log and when the Slave db connection with synchronous_replication is configured.
Fixes the issue where a customer attribute "Is required" setting doesn't work properly as per website scope in Admin.
Fixes the issue with the performance of DB triggers recreation during setup:upgrade.
Fixes the issue where updating a "website scope" attribute in a specific store view overrides the attribute values in the global scope.
Fixes the issue where the customer shopping cart gets cleared after the customer session has expired with enabled persistent shopping cart.
Fixes the issue where PHPSESSID regenerates on POST requests on the storefront area for a logged-in customer if the L2 Redis cache is enabled and the customer is updated from Admin.
Fixes the issue where return attribute labels for the default store view are returned via GraphQL API when a non-default store view is specified in the request header.
Fixes the issue where devices with a width of 768px are treated as mobile, causing the menu and header to load in a mobile view instead of desktop.
Fixes pinch-to-zoom functionality on the product detail page images in mobile view on Chrome.
Fixes an exception that happens when loading product prices with both lower and upper bound equal to $0.
Fixes the issue where customer group-related information is saved in the wrong segment due to the old value of the X-Magento-Vary in request.
Fixes the issue where store-level URL rewrites are incorrectly updated during import.

Fixes the issue where forms in the Admin area with Page Builder throw the error "Page Builder was rendering for 5 seconds without releasing locks." in the browser console after submitting the form, and changes can't be saved.
Fixes the issue where an order from Admin cannot be placed if HTML minification is enabled.
Fixes the issue with updating customers via V1/customers REST API endpoint when using the integration access token generated from the backend.
Fix cron deadlocks and improve cron locking
Add Zookeeper and flock locks
Add Zookeeper and flock locks
Fix Problems with Consumer Runners on Cloud Clusters
Google chart API used by Magento dashboard scheduled to be turned off
Add the possibility to configure max execution time during static content deployment
Suppress PDO warnings to work around PHP bugs #63812, #74401
Pre-auth SQL
Multi-thread SCD
setup:upgrade returns error code if app:config:import failed
Re-work consumers to terminate as soon as there is nothing left to process
Backward Compatibility of new Mail Interfaces
Catalog Product pagination does not work on Elasticsearch 6.x
Catalog Product collection method chaining is broken
Reduce q-ty of error report files
Fix XSS in order history
Pass Store View scope in the Async/Bulk Web API
Admin path disclosure bug
FPC is getting disabled during deployments

Redis improvements

Redis improvements

Auto increment number jumping up for catalog_product_entity_* tables
Fixes the error 'The file can't be deleted. Warning!unlink: No such file or directory' when flushing JS/CSS cache from the Admin
Reduced the number of times the same deployment configurations load
Fixes the issue where missed jobs unnecessarily wait for cron job locks.
Enhanced Layout Cache Efficiency (memory usage reduced)
Layered navigation filter is present only when product is present on the listing page with enabled Shared catalog

Fix pagebuilder module

Fix pagebuilder module

Fixes issue with Varnish 6 when 503 error was returned and VCL error Too many restarts in logs. Author: @jonashrem
